data.name: OutWave
data.detailed_description:
Steam Exclusive Offer






About the Game

Information

Endless car chase is a fast retro style paced game in which you must collect money and avoid the cops! The game supports Windows, Mac, LinuxIt can be played with the keyboard, gamepad. Buy and control a cars or motorbikes. Listen to retro music and don't get caught by the cops!


Mini plot

After 30 years, you come back to Retro City, the cops are waiting for You. What you can do is turn your favorite Radio Flashback Retro FM and pedal to the metal.


Game features

  • The game looks like a GIF from Windows 95
  • RTX 3080 ti 400-500 FPS
  • During a chase, you find out that your brake is not working, you can only go forward
  • Simple game and gameplay
  • Radio Flashback Retro FM (retro hits)
  • GIF edition + aesthetics + summer edition
  • Police radio chatter
  • Buy retro cars, bikes
  • 29 languages
  • Collect a bonus items (money, repair, etc.)
  • Gamepad, keyboard (in menu/game) or mouse (only menu)
  • 100 Steam Achievements, Play remote TV
  • Best scores
  • Windows, MacOS, Linux
  • Hot price
  • Endless gameplay

data.short_description: Endless car chase is a fast retro style paced game in which you must collect money and avoid the cops! The game supports Windows, Mac, Linux. Use keyboard or gamepad. Buy and control a cars or motorbikes. Listen to retro music and don't get caught by the cops! The game looks like a gif!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHZ, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ 32bit or 64bit
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHZ, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ 32bit or 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460, GTX 1060
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
